fixes: Android: fixed a bug with navigation controls.
Fixed a bug on the "Countries" page that caused blank results when filtering by name when the current page was not the first one.
Fixed a bug on the "Countries" page that caused blank results when filtering by continent when the current page was not the first one.

changes: Countries list is now paginated to help with performance.

features: Added a loading screen when the app is loading.
fixes: Mobile: Fixed an issue that caused the app to not store the highscore when the app was updated.

changes: A few style changes have been made.
features: Android app has been released on Google Play Store
Transitions between screens have been added.
More information about the app has been added to the "About" page.
fixes: Grammar mistake in the "About" page has been fixed.
Android: status color bar in game is now reactive on theme change.

changes: App is now using Roboto font family.
Reduced the size of in-game flags on small screens.
The score number in game now bounces when it is updated.
features: Android: status color bar has been added and is reactive on theme change.
fixes: Mobile: on the "Countries" page, searching by name no longer waits for the text field to blur to apply the search filter.

changes: The logo of the app has been changed.
